014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.util.Iterator;
017
018import java.util.function.Supplier;
019
020/**
021 * An {@link Iterable} and a {@link Supplier} of contextual references.
022 *
023 * @param <R> the common supertype of references supplied by this class
024 *
025 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson/" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
026 */
027public interface References<R> extends AutoCloseable, Iterable<R>, Supplier<R> {
028
029  /**
030   * Effectively destroyes the supplied contextual reference, rendering it unfit for use, if and only if it has no scope
031   * (is dependent) and was originally supplied by the {@link #get() get()} method.
032   *
033   * @param r the contextual reference to destroy; may be {@code null} in which case no action will be taken
034   *
035   * @exception DestructionException if {@code r} is unsuitable for any reason or could not be destroyed
036   */
037  // Destroys r if and only if it is (a) dependent and (b) supplied by get()
038  public boolean destroy(final R r);
039
040  public default Cardinality cardinality() {
041    final Iterator<?> i = this.iterator();
042    if (i.hasNext()) {
043      i.next();
044      return i.hasNext() ? Cardinality.MANY : Cardinality.ONE;
045    }
046    return Cardinality.ZERO;
047  }
048
049  @Override // Supplier<R>
050  public default R get() {
051    final Iterator<R> iterator = this.iterator();
052    if (!iterator.hasNext()) {
053      throw new UnsatisfiedResolutionException();
054    }
055    final R returnValue = iterator.next();
056    if (iterator.hasNext()) {
057      throw new AmbiguousResolutionException();
058    }
059    return returnValue;
060  }
061
062  // Overriding encouraged to be more efficient/threadsafe/etc.
063  @Override // AutoCloseable
064  public default void close() {
065    for (final R r : this) {
066      this.destroy(r);
067    }
068  }
069
070  public static enum Cardinality {
071
072    ZERO,
073    ONE,
074    MANY
075
076  }
077
078}
